user.title: EV Smart Charger Setup
user.description:
Welcome to EV Smart Charger! This integration will help you optimize your EV charging based on solar production, battery levels, and energy costs.

First, give this integration a name.

data_description.name: A friendly name to identify this EV Smart Charger instance (e.g., 'Garage Charger', 'Main EV')

entities.title: EV Charger Configuration
entities.description:
Select the entities that control your EV charger.

**All fields are required** to ensure proper operation.

data_description.ev_charger_switch: The switch entity that turns your EV charger on/off (domain: switch)
data_description.ev_charger_current: The entity that controls charging current/amperage. Supports levels: 6A, 8A, 10A, 13A, 16A, 20A, 24A, 32A (domain: number, select, input_number, input_select)
data_description.ev_charger_status: Sensor showing charger status. Must report: 'charger_charging' (actively charging), 'charger_free' (not connected), 'charger_end' (plugged but not charging)

sensors.title: Energy Monitoring Sensors
sensors.description:
Select the sensors that monitor your energy system.

**All fields are required** for smart charging decisions.

data_description.soc_car: Sensor showing your EV's battery state of charge in percentage (0-100%)
data_description.soc_home: Sensor showing your home battery state of charge in percentage (0-100%)
data_description.fv_production: Sensor showing current solar panel production in Watts (W)
data_description.home_consumption: Sensor showing current home power consumption in Watts (W), excluding EV charger

init.title: Update Charger Configuration
init.description:
Modify the entities that control your EV charger.

**All fields are required**.

data_description.ev_charger_switch: The switch entity that turns your EV charger on/off
data_description.ev_charger_current: The entity that controls charging current (6-32A)

sensors.title: Update Energy Sensors
sensors.description:
Modify the sensors that monitor your energy system.

**All fields are required**.
